name: zChemsScienceShuffle
title: Chem's Science Shuffle (fork of Al's Science Shuffle)
author: Chembot
description: A fork of the original Al's Science Shuffle with some errors fixed and features added. Mainly compatibility with MSP (the 30 science pack mod) Randomizes science ingredients while keeping complexity and total resources balanced. This is my first time writing lua dont be suprised if it dosent work too well. Edit settings at your own risk. All credit for the actual heavy lifting goes to Al, I just added a few features.
